alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 6:50AM EST until December 10 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain likely with occasional freezing drizzle. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of western Maryland, western Virginia and eastern West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Road conditions could change between wet and icy due to localized temperature differences.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton
